title: The Story of English. Parts 5-9
brief_description: Prog 5 - Pioneers! O Pioneers; Prog 6 - Black on White; Prog 7 - The Muvver Tongue; Prog 89 - The Loaded Weapon; Prog 9 - The Empire Strikes Back. A Nine part series that tells the story of English as a spoken language: how it started and survived, spread and developed. “The Story of English” spans more than 1,000 years of world history and visits locations on five continents. It presents a picture of the English speaking world and English speaking peoples of many nationalities and backgrounds.
